title: Robust Data Watermarking in Language Models by Injecting Fictitious Knowledge
details: X Cui, JTZ Wei, S Swayamdipta, R Jia - arXiv preprint arXiv:2503.04036, 2025
abstract: Data watermarking in language models injects traceable signals, such as specific token sequences or stylistic patterns, into copyrighted text, allowing copyright holders to track and verify training data ownership. Previous data watermarking techniques …
